content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The conversation was about negotiating the price, but it appears that no agreement was reached during the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I would rate Yi-Nuo Wang's likeability as a negotiation partner as a 7. Yi-Nuo seemed polite, understanding of the value of the property, and willing to negotiate fairly, which are all positive traits in a negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Yi-Nuo Wang conducted themselves professionally and respectfully throughout the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: Since I did not feel discriminated or offended, I do not need to provide a reason for this.
name: Peter Schmidt
